scripts.start:server: lerna run build --scope=@speedrun-browser-game/common && lerna run start --scope=@speedrun-browser-game/server
scripts.delete: rm -rf node_modules/ && rm -rf packages/client/.parcel-cache && rm -rf packages/client/dist && rm -rf packages/common/build && rm -rf packages/common/node_modules && rm -rf packages/server/build && rm -rf packages/server/node_modules && npm i
